import Mathlib

/-- Prove that SO n is a normal subgroup of O n and that the quotient O n / SO n is isomorphic to Zˣ. -/
theorem normal_SO_in_O (n : ℕ) : SO n ⊲ O n := by
  sorry

theorem quotient_O_n_SO_n_iso_Z_units (n : ℕ) : (O n) ⧸ (SO n) ≅ Zˣ := by
  sorry
